snippet: Chris Froome says he will lead Team Sky at the Tour de France, despite his teammate Bradley Wiggins’s saying a decision has not been made by team management.
abstract: Chris Froome says he will lead Team Sky at the Tour de France, despite declarations from  teammate Bradley Wiggins that decision has not been made by team management.
lead_paragraph: Chris Froome says he will lead Team Sky at the Tour de France, despite his teammate Bradley Wiggins’s saying a decision has not been made by team management.
